name: Low Carbon Seed Fund
overview: Low Carbon Seed Fund was established with Â£1m from Carbon Trust Investments Ltd, and Â£1m from Imperial Innovations funded by a grant from the Shell Foundation. The fund invests in early stage UK companies which are developing clean or alternative energy technologies, including wind power, solar power, tidal power, fuel cells, biofuels, new materials and process improvement. The fund invests between Â£50,000 and Â£250,000 in seed or early stage funding rounds.
